CustomField.inlineHelpText: Recommend the patient to remain isolated until after they have taken a second COVID-19 test, and it is negative (2nd test is performed 48 hrs after the first test is negative) if the patient has contact with individuals at high risk from COVID-19. Inform the patient that testing is available to them through their local VA facility if they would prefer testing there, instead of at-home testing.
CustomField.label: A false-negative result is possible
